title: Chain Guillotines
summaries: The Chain Guillotines are a Hardmode autoswinging flail that fires two blade projectiles attached to chains in rapid succession, with a maximum range of 22 tiles. It can also pierce multiple enemies when standing inside them or very close, therefore being a lot more effective at close quarters. The Chain Guillotines have a 1/5 (20%) chance of being dropped by Corrupt Mimics.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 8 GC
